item.description:
Meetups are usually about photographing certain events, places, or people.  But we photographers are social beings, and as such can enjoy a social gathering with as much gusto as emergency room nurses or accountants. Especially when that gathering revolved around doing a good turn for young deserving artists. And even more especially when that gathering involved margaritas and nachos. Am I right, or what?

Margaritas Mexican Restaurant in Exeter will be the place to be for a fundraiser for the SAA Scholarship Fund. Margaritas will host a Noche Mexicana Fundraiser and donate 15% of pre-taxed food and beverage sales from participants to the SAA Scholarship Fund.

Note that you MUST give your server the special donation card, conveniently made available at the link below, or all your dining and drinking will be for naught.

>> Print and Bring this Card!

The event occurs from 4 to 10 pm at the Margarita’s at 93 Portsmouth Avenue in Exeter, NH. Please share this invitation with friends, family, community members, and anyone you can wrangle up. For call ahead seating call (603) 772-2274.

We encourage students, parents and community members to join us as we raise funds to support our Scholarship Fund.  Please share this invitation with friends, family and community members. And please make sure to let the host or server know that you are there to support the fundraiser, so 15% of your pre-tax food and beverage purchases will be donated to the Seacoast Artists Association.
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the small of the nachos and margaritas
item.name: Nachos Libre! There's Art in Them There Margaritas!
